dcterms:description: The NGSIM dataset is one of the largest open datasets of naturalistic driving, containing more than 5000 trajectories of individual vehicles collected on the I-80 freeway in Emeryville, California. The data includes instantaneous speed, acceleration, longitudinal and lateral positions, vehicle length, and vehicle type, sampled at 10 Hz over a 45-minute period.
dcterms:title: NGSIM
